result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) and Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs). The defendant was found guilty of OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs) and the other charge, Operating w/ PAC (4th w/in 5 yrs) was dismissed by the court.

  • Jared Keith Eppers was found guilty of OWI (4th w/in 5 yrs), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Length of confinement and length of extended supervision for a total length of 3 years and 2 months bifurcated sentence.

superMiscConds.notes: Defendant must pay all outstanding fees and court obligations. DNA surcharge assessed.  If supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.  Collections may include income assignment.
Obtain and maintain full-time employment OR attend school full-time, may be a combination of both to equal 40 hours per week.

Alcohol assessment and follow through with recommendations. No alcohol, random UA's at discretion of agent.  Defendant may not have any alcohol in or on the premises of home.  Defendant may not go into any establishments that sell alcohol except for restaurants and grocery stores.
Counseling, treatment, services as deemed appropriate by agent, including alcohol and drug counseling and treatment. Defendant must obey all rules and regulations of probation.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea
